text: Daniel Wu Neh-Tsu (, born September 30, 1974) is an American actor. He has been in over 60 movies. He starred in the AMC martial arts drama series Into the Badlands. Wu was born in Berkeley, California. He is known for his role as Joe Kwan in New Police Story. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Hong Kong actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Movie directors from California Category:Movie producers from California Category:Screenwriters from California Category:Actors from Berkeley, California
title: Daniel Wu
